resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `user_decision_attributes` ( `information` varchar ( 45 ), `state` integer, `user_decision_attributes_id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `user_decision_id` integer NOT NULL, `data_atttribute_id` integer NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`user_decision_id`) REFERENCES `user_decision`(`user_decision_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, FOREIGN KEY(`data_atttribute_id`) REFERENCES `data_attributes`(`data_attributes_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `request` ( `inferred_decision_id` integer, `uuid` varchar ( 100 ), `user_decision_id` integer, `data_id` integer NOT NULL, `reason` varchar ( 100 ), `consumer_id` integer NOT NULL, `state` integer, `location` varchar ( 45 ), `request_id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `check_user` integer, `user_benefit` varchar ( 45 ), FOREIGN KEY(`data_id`) REFERENCES `data`(`data_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, FOREIGN KEY(`consumer_id`) REFERENCES `consumer`(`consumer_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, FOREIGN KEY(`user_decision_id`) REFERENCES `user_decision`(`user_decision_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, FOREIGN KEY(`inferred_decision_id`) REFERENCES `inferred_decision`(`inferred_decision_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `inferred_decision_attributes` ( `data_attributes_id` integer NOT NULL, `inferred_decision_attributes_id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `trust_level` varchar, `inferred_decision_id` integer NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`data_attributes_id`) REFERENCES `data_attributes`(`data_attributes_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, FOREIGN KEY(`inferred_decision_id`) REFERENCES `inferred_decision`(`inferred_decision_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `data_attributes` ( `data_id` integer NOT NULL, `attribute` varchar ( 45 ), `inferred` integer, `shared` integer, `data_attributes_id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `retention` varchar ( 45 ), FOREIGN KEY(`data_id`) REFERENCES `data`(`data_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `consumer_attributes` ( `attribute` varchar ( 45 ), `value` varchar ( 45 ), `consumer_attributes_id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `consumer_id` integer NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`consumer_id`) REFERENCES `consumer`(`consumer_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION );
